ygData.subject: Re: Fw: Argh!  A ticked cleric...
ygData.msgSnippet: again, bind in Kith, and every hour or so during the day of course, gate to the cabin, and check it.  I got mine in probably 4 hours of doing this.  I went
ygData.messageBody:
again, bind in Kith, and every hour or so during the day of course, gate to
the cabin, and check it. I got mine in probably 4 hours of doing this. I
went back an forth between Kith and Befallen to clear the Babbin placeholder
and get the icon/ingot from Kith.

Az


-----Original Message-----
From: Pam <adira399@...>
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, January 20, 2000 2:05 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Fw: Argh! A ticked cleric...


>From: Pam <adira399@...>
>
>I fully agree with you!
>
>The cleric quests wouldnt be so bad if they weren't so
>unbelievably boring. I sat in a burned out cabin for
>hours! (before kithicor turned into a madhouse) I
>went afk for 2 minutes. I ended up getting a tell
>from another player saying how he "accidentally"
>picked up the groundspawn. *sigh* Accidentally...
>Acidentally! After this, I totally gave up.
>
>The stats on the cleric armor arent all that
>impressive. I wanted to do these quests just for that
>feeling of accomplishment. (plus the armor is kind of
>pretty) BAH, I give up!
>
>Adira Soulsaver
>Blessed by Tunare 41 times
>Rodcet Nife
>
